title:
Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds
descriptions: Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs - the ultimate hearing protection for your shooting range experience. With dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers and a sound-activated compression reaction of just 0.02 seconds, these earmuffs deliver clear sound and added safety. The noise reduction rating of 23 dB, along with 2 omnidirectional microphones, ensures effective sound dampening. Plus, the earmuffs feature an audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs for enhanced convenience. With a comfortable headband and foldable metal wire frame, these earmuffs are easy to wear and store. Powered by 2 AAA batteries (included), they are ready to use right out-of-the-box. Measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, you'll hardly notice the weight while shooting. Upgrade your shooting experience with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs today!

Introducing Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs, the perfect solution for protecting your hearing at the shooting range. These earmuffs feature dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers, delivering clear sound with a sound-activated compression reaction time of just 0.02 seconds. With independent volume controls, you can easily adjust the sound to your liking.

Designed with a noise reduction rating of 23 dB, these earmuffs provide effective sound dampening. Equipped with 2 omnidirectional microphones, they offer enhanced sound clarity. The audio input jack allows you to connect your devices for added convenience.

The recessed volume control knobs and comfortable headband with a foldable metal wire frame make these earmuffs easy to use and store. Operating on 2 AAA batteries (included), they are ready to use straight out of the box.

Measuring 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing just 0.98 pounds, these earmuffs are lightweight and comfortable to wear. Say goodbye to heavy ear protection and enjoy a comfortable shooting experience.

The audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs make it easy to adjust the settings to your preference. The composite housing effectively dampens sound, enhancing the overall experience.

Designed for comfort, these earmuffs have a comfortable headband with a metal wire frame that can be easily folded for storage. They operate on two AAA batteries, which are conveniently included in the package. Measuring at 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighing only 0.98 pounds, you won't even notice the weight while wearing them. 

Experience the ultimate combination of protection and comfort with Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs. Don't compromise on your hearing safety - get yours today!

generation_prompt_text:
Write an advertising description for the following product. Use the existing description below as a guideline, matching it roughly in quality and level of detail. Do not include information not available in the description below. Do not directly plagiarize the description below. Be concise and informative. Assume potential buyers who read the ad have access to a photo of the product, and are scanning through many different similar advertisements, spending little time on each, and that they value being able to quickly see the most important details.

---

Title: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs; Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers; sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls;
Noise reduction 23 dB; 2 omnidirectional microphones; audio input jack; recessed volume control knobs; 2 AAA batteries (included); size: 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches; weight: 0.98 pounds

Description: Walker's Razor Slim Earmuffs


Protect your hearing at the shooting range with Walker's Razor Slim Protection Ear Muff with low noise/frequency tuned for natural sound clarity and added safety

Dynamic shooting range high-definition speakers for clear sound with sound-activated compression reaction of 0.02 seconds with independent volume controls

Noise reduction rating of 23 dB with 2 omnidirectional microphones and includes an audio input jack and recessed volume control knobs plus composite housing for effective sound dampening

Comfortable headband with a metal wire frame that folds for easy storage and operates on 2 AAA batteries that are already included in the package so it is ready out-of-the-box

Easy to use and comfortable to wear that measures 8.10 x 4.60 x 10.60 inches and weighs 0.98 pounds so you cannot feel the heaviness of the ear protection when shooting
